content: अभिनीत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Brought near, conveyed. {@--2@} Performed, represented dramatically. {@--3@} Highly finished or polished, most excellent. {@--4@} Highly ornamented or decorated. {@--5@} Fit, proper, suitable (योग्य); अभिनीततरं वाक्यमित्युवाच युधिष्ठिरः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--6@} Patient, forgiving, even-minded. {@--7@} Angry (युक्तेऽतिसंस्कृतेमर्षिण्यभिनीतः <ls>Ak.</ls> where the word may be अमर्षिणि as well). {@--8@} Kind, friendly.
